en.title: FE Donates Baht 280,000 to 3 Charities at Khon Kaen Event!!
en.content:
At the Khon Kaen Achievers Recognition Dinner organized by Thai Presidential Director Jankij on Friday, 09th January 2009, FE donated to the following charities.

1. Baht 100,000 to Khon Kaen School for the Blind.
   (Baht 50,000 from FE and Baht 50,000 from Jankij).

2. Baht 80,000 to Governor's Charity Foundation.
   (Baht 50,000 from FE and Baht 30,000 from Jankij).

3. Baht 100,000 to Southern Provinces Active Soldiers Fund.
   (Baht 50,000 from FE and Baht 50,000 from Jankij).

FE is very proud of PD Jankij for his leadership and for showing great generosity and compassion to the less fortunate of society. Keep it up, Jankij!
